Let $ 1,4,\cdots$ and $ 9,16,\cdots$ be two arithmetic progressions. The set $ S$ is the union of the first $ 2004$ terms of each sequence. How many distinct numbers are in $ S$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 3722\qquad \textbf{(B)}\ 3732\qquad \textbf{(C)}\ 3914\qquad \textbf{(D)}\ 3924\qquad \textbf{(E)}\ 4007$
